attributes.title: Young at Bart - Ep. 72
attributes.caption: Our Adventurers meet up with some old friends to formulate a two-pronged plan of action to kick off Arc 7 in the Infinight Saga- Of Life & Breath!
attributes.description:

attributes.caption: The Infinights make their plan of action to make it into the land of Tetora! But what tricks and traps await them in this land of mystery....

attributes.title: Win, Lose, or Shaddrow - Ep. 74
attributes.caption:
Our adventurers skirmish with several Shaddrow in a darkened city in search of a Draconic Elder.

Thanks to Raquel Lily (@RaquelLily on twitter) and ??? for lending their voice to this episode!
